verses.verse: Now on the <S%H2856>sealed<s%> document [were the names of: ] <S%H5166>Nehemiah<s%> the <S%H8660>governor,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2446>Hacaliah,<s%> and <S%H6667>Zedekiah,<s%>
And the <S%H3881>Levites:<s%> <S%H3091>Jeshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H245>Azaniah,<s%> <S%H1131>Binnui<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2582>Henadad,<s%> <S%H6934>Kadmiel;<s%>

Now the <S%H7605>rest<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> the <S%H7778>gatekeepers,<s%> the <S%H7891>singers,<s%> the <S%H5411>temple<s%> <S%H5411>servants,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> those who had <S%H914>separated<s%> themselves from the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>lands<s%> to the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> their <S%H802>wives,<s%> their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> those who <S%H3045>had<s%> <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> and <S%H995>understanding,<s%>

are <S%H2388>joining<s%> with their <S%H251>kinsmen,<s%> their <S%H117>nobles,<s%> and are <S%H935>taking<s%> on themselves a <S%H423>curse<s%> and an <S%H7621>oath<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in <S%H3068>God<s%>'s <S%H8451>law,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> God's <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and to <S%H8104>keep<s%> and to <S%H6213>observe<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of God our <S%H136>Lord,<s%> and His <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> and His <S%H2706>statutes;<s%>
and that we will not <S%H5414>give<s%> our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> or <S%H3947>take<s%> their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> for our <S%H1121>sons.<s%>

As for the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> who <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H4728>wares<s%> or <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H7668>grain<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H4376>sell,<s%> we will not <S%H3947>buy<s%> from them on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> or a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> and we will <S%H5203>forego<s%> [the crops] the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> and the <S%H4855>exaction<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3027>debt.<s%>

We also <S%H5975>placed<s%> ourselves <S%H5921>under<s%> <S%H4687>obligation<s%> to <S%H5414>contribute<s%> <S%H8141>yearly<s%> one <S%H7992>third<s%> of a <S%H8255>shekel<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our God: <S%H430><s%>

for the <S%H3899>showbread,<s%> <S%H4635><s%> for the <S%H8548>continual<s%> grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> for the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbaths,<s%> the <S%H2320>new<s%> <S%H2320>moon,<s%> for the <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>times,<s%> for the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944>things<s%> and for the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offerings<s%> to <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God.<s%>

Likewise we <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> for the <S%H9528>supply<s%> of <S%H6086>wood<s%> [among] the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> in order that they might <S%H935>bring<s%> it to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> according to our fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> at <S%H2163>fixed<s%> <S%H6256>times<s%> <S%H8141>annually,<s%> to <S%H1197>burn<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> as it is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8451>law;<s%>

and in order that they might <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H1061>first<s%> <S%H1061>fruits<s%> of our <S%H127>ground<s%> and the <S%H1061>first<s%> <S%H1061>fruits<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8141>annually,<s%>

and <S%H935>bring<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%> the first-born of our <S%H1121>sons<s%> and of our <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and the first-born of our <S%H1241>herds<s%> and our <S%H6629>flocks<s%> as it is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8451>law,<s%> for the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who are <S%H8334>ministering<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God.<s%>

We will also <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H7225>first<s%> of our <S%H6182>dough,<s%> our <S%H8641>contributions,<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> the <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine<s%> and the <S%H3323>oil<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests<s%> at the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> and the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of our <S%H127>ground<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> for the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> are they who <S%H6237>receive<s%> the <S%H6237>tithes<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5656>rural<s%> <S%H5892>towns.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> shall be with the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> when the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6237>receive<s%> <S%H6237>tithes,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H5927>bring<s%> up the <S%H4643>tenth<s%> of the <S%H4643>tithes<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> to the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> of the <S%H214>storehouse.<s%>

For the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H8641>contribution<s%> of the <S%H1715>grain,<s%> the <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine<s%> and the <S%H3323>oil,<s%> to the <S%H3957>chambers;<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> are the <S%H3627>utensils<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who are <S%H8334>ministering,<s%> the <S%H7778>gatekeepers,<s%> and the <S%H7891>singers.<s%> Thus we will not <S%H5800>neglect<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God.<s%>
